characters.name: Devika
characters.background_story: A skilled herbalist who saved her village from a deadly plague with her knowledge of ancient remedies. Died in a monsoon flood while helping villagers to safety.

characters.name: Aaryan
characters.background_story: A notorious warlord who sought power at any cost, betraying allies and enemies alike. Met his end in a battle, betrayed by his own commanders.

characters.name: Lykos
characters.background_story: A revered philosopher who traveled across lands to spread knowledge and wisdom. Died peacefully after imparting his final words of wisdom.

characters.name: Dion
characters.background_story: A cunning trader known for manipulating market prices to his advantage, causing famine. Died in a shipwreck off the coast.

characters.name: Meiying
characters.background_story: A compassionate caretaker of orphans, teaching them skills and wisdom beyond their years. Died saving children from a burning building.

characters.name: Zheng
characters.background_story: An ambitious general who betrayed his emperor for power, leading to years of turmoil. Poisoned by a rival.

characters.name: Arash
characters.background_story: A legendary archer known for his unwavering commitment to justice and fairness. Died heroically in a battle to protect his people from invaders.

characters.name: Roshan
characters.background_story: A wealthy merchant who exploited the poor, amassing wealth through deceit and exploitation. Died of a mysterious illness that none could diagnose.

characters.name: Neith
characters.background_story: A skilled artisan whose creations were dedicated to the gods and used in many ceremonies. Passed away in her sleep, surrounded by her work.

characters.name: Sethos
characters.background_story: A ruthless governor who imposed harsh taxes on his people, causing widespread suffering. Assassinated by a disgruntled subject.
